mapper.select: select ms.*, ms.plan_id as PLAN_ID, (select s.stname from station s where ms.stcd = s.stcd) as STNAME, (select s.type from station s where ms.stcd = s.stcd) as STTP, (select p.name from [plan] p where ms.plan_id = p.id) as PLAN_NAME from model_station ms where 1=1 and ms.model_id = #{modelId} order by ms.id asc
select count(ms.plan_id) as PLAN_COUNT from model_station ms where 1=1 and ms.plan_id = #{planId}
mapper.insert:
insert into model_station (model_id, stcd, plan_id, ke, xe, intv, fa_stcd) values
(#{item.modelId},#{item.stcd},#{item.planId},#{item.ke},#{item.xe},#{item.intv},#{item.faStcd})
